name: bracket
description: Bracket is a self-hosted note-taking and journaling app optimized for simplicity. Users can keep daily logs, private thoughts, and observations, all stored in markdown and accessible through a clean web interface.

features.title: Daily Logs
features.description: Keep daily journals and personal observations. Document your life

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Notes stored in portable markdown format. Future-proof

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Minimal, distraction-free web UI. Focus on writing

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted for complete privacy. Your journal, your control

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find past entries quickly with search. Never lose a thought

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Easy categorization and tagging. Stay organized
